concentration - a) the act of concentrating; the state of being concentrated; b) exclusive attention to one object; close mental application.
to notice or perceive; to pay special attention to.
to draw by appealing to the emotions or senses, by stimulating interest or by exciting admiration; to attract.
(fig.) (a respectful term to say) 'please comṛ or 'please go'.
to give kindly; to bestow upon.
to request humbly; to beseech; to implore; to solicit.
the plant Dolichandrone falcata of Bignoniaceae family with trumpet-like flower.
Manmatha, the Love-God.
